channel.title: Mobile Payment on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in Mobile Payment on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
2C2P Logo 2C2P is a Southeast Asia-based payments provider that works with global enterprises to accept payments across online, mobile and offline channels, as well as provide issuing, payouts, remittance and digital goods aggregation and reselling services. It is co-headquartered in Singapore and Bangkok and operates across Southeast Asia and Europe. Source
You can download the2C2Plogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: 2C2P
item.description: 2C2P is a Southeast Asia-based payments provider that works with global enterprises to accept payments across online, mobile and offline channels, as well as provide issuing, payouts, remittance and digital goods aggregation and reselling services. It is co-headquartered in Singapore and Bangkok and operates across Southeast Asia and Europe. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
PayMe from HSBC Logo PayMe is a mobile payment service from HSBC, currently available only for Hong Kong users with local phone numbers and banks. Users can pay businesses, transfer money to one another using a mobile app, linked to their credit card or bank account. As of July 2018, the service had over one million active users, out of a Hong Kong population of 7.3 million. Source
You can download thePayMelogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: PayMe
item.description: PayMe is a mobile payment service from HSBC, currently available only for Hong Kong users with local phone numbers and banks. Users can pay businesses, transfer money to one another using a mobile app, linked to their credit card or bank account. As of July 2018, the service had over one million active users, out of a Hong Kong population of 7.3 million. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Swish Logo
Swish is a mobile payment system in Sweden. The service was launched in 2012 by six large Swedish banks, in cooperation with Bankgirot and the Central Bank of Sweden. It had 6.5 million users as of September 2018. Swish is a member of the European Mobile Payment Systems Association. The service works through a smartphone application, through which the user’s phone number is connected to their bank account, and which makes it possible to transfer money in real time, a few seconds until confirmation is received by both parties.
You can download theSwishlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Swish
item.description: Swish is a mobile payment system in Sweden. The service was launched in 2012 by six large Swedish banks, in cooperation with Bankgirot and the Central Bank of Sweden. It had 6.5 million users as of September 2018. Swish is a member of the European Mobile Payment Systems Association. The service works through a smartphone application, through which the user’s phone number is connected to their bank account, and which makes it possible to transfer money in real time, a few seconds until confirmation is received by both parties.
